summary: Frontend testing completed for SellerCloudX - Seller landing page, Admin/Partner login flows, and Invalid Date fix verification. All 4 requested features tested and working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: SellerLandingPage.tsx - Well structured premium landing page with FOMO elements (countdown timer, spots left counter)
formatDate helper function in AdminPartnersManagement.tsx properly handles null/undefined dates with try-catch
All CTA buttons correctly redirect to /partner-registration with appropriate tariff and promo parameters
context_for_next_testing_agent: All requested features verified working. Seller landing page has proper FOMO elements, login flows redirect correctly, and Invalid Date bug is fixed.

details.fomo_banner: ✅ Fixed top banner with 'BEPUL O'RNATISH: Faqat 7 ta joy qoldi!'
details.spots_left: ✅ Dynamic spots counter showing '7 ta joy qoldi'
details.cta_buttons: ✅ All CTA buttons redirect to /partner-registration with correct params

details.invalid_date_check: ✅ No 'Invalid Date' text found on page
details.dates_displayed: ✅ ISO format dates showing correctly (2026-01-23, 2026-01-12, etc.)
details.formatDate_function: ✅ Helper function in AdminPartnersManagement.tsx handles null/undefined dates
